title: Surprise party Amumu
body:
{{champion:32}} A simple skin idea I sketched up. Basically he's poka dot wrapping paper with glowsticks on his wrists and balloons that trail his foot :3. I couldn't work out any nice colour schemes c':
Q: ribbons
W: sad little tears
E: ribbons and confetti
R: balloons and confetti with the words 'happy birthday' circling it.

replies.body: It's my birthday and I can cry if I want too
congratulations! I saw the skin spotlight for it.

Just checked surrender20 

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/03/311-pbe-update.html#amu1

And Riot is actually making this skin! 

Free skin for credit anyone? :D
Dude this is a really great skin, and I love to play Amumu, so I would love this to be a real thing.
Cool idea I'd buy that skin for sure
Actually.. i'm impressed :P That's a great skin idea, hopefully riot notices this.

Better make a surprise party team rito.

ADC - Surprise party Jinx >.>   
Support - Surprise party Blitzcrank
Mid - Surprise party Lissandra - The ultimate would be epic...
Top - Surprise party Fiddlesticks...?
Jungle - Surprise party Amumu
